definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: :La 4:3 jackal (so most; Tr:NHB 109 ff., 263 f. Shipley-Cook:Ency. Bib. JACKAL; but wolf Post:Hast. DB DRAGON, cf. Che:Is 13:22 and (rare) Ar. tiyna0nun);—pl. [[תַּנִּים]] Mic 1:8 +, [[תַּנִּין]] La 4:3 (Ges:§ 87 e), [[לְתַנּוֹת]] Mal 1:3 (si vera l.; LXX Thes al. interpret = dwellings, Sta Now conjecture [[נְאוֹת]], Marti [[נׇתַתִּי לְ]]);—jackal, howling mournfully in waste places, Mic 1:8, Job 30:29 (both ‖[[בְּנוֹת יַעֲנׇה ]]), Is 13:22 (‖[[אִיִּים ]]), in desert also Is 43:20 (‖[[בְּנוֹת יַעֲנׇה ]]); deserted sites called ´[[מְעוֹן ת]]: Je 9:10, Je 10:22, Je 49:33, Je 51:37, ´[[נְוֵה ת]]: Is 34:13 Is 35:7, ´[[מְקוֹם ת]]: Psalm; [[מִדְבָּר]] ´[[ת]]: Mal 1:3 (si vera l., but v. supra); ´[[ת]]: as snuffing up wind Je 14:6, giving suck La 4:3.
